EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Fred, Please see my responses below in blue…. Thanks!Sara___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Fred Klapetzky [mailto:fklapetzky@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, November 08, 2012 6:34 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Updated MBO Terms and Conditions with MD as the state of Law It was sent and I sent your email to them as well for the contact person to complete our side of it. Did not hear back today, so I will check with Larry in the morning. Larry Foley is our contact, but he’ll be turning the contract paperwork over to Paul Beyers, the purchasing agent for Hopkins. Like to have that one signed soon. – Sounds good, just introduce me to the client when appropriate. Second item. The very large contract ($300k) with Gwinnett Health System is moving forward in Atlanta. They’ll have the same requirement for the legal venue to be in Georgia. Don’t think anything else will be an issue. I have a meeting scheduled for November 19 with them and should have more information at that point as to when it signs. Sounds good, we are fine with having the language changed to Georgia. Third item, we have some questions on invoicing and drawing salaries since we have some serious tax consequences if we get it wrong. Do you want to talk through that with us, or is there someone else I should meet with. This and next we’ll have a bunch of capital gains and if the tax law changes, we’ll have much higher taxes levied on us and that is not desirable. Unlike Mr. Warren Buffet, I really don’t think I should pay any more in taxes than required by law. I want to make sure we have everything sequenced properly. I would be the person to talk to in terms of how you can use your MBO account to maximize tax benefits, however, I am not an accountant and therefore can only advise as to what is feasible though the MBO program. My guess is you will want to take our talk and then relay that to a tax accountant if you have additional questions. You may schedule a time on my calendar to discuss at your convenience here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. Thanks, Fred Fred Klapetzky, Principal ConsultantA Going Concern Consulting Services872 Spring Valley DrOkawville, IL 62271 (618) 581-1047 From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Thursday, November 08, 2012 5:25 PM To: Fred Klapetzky Subject: RE: Updated MBO Terms and Conditions with MD as the state of Law Hi Fred, Just wanted to follow up with you on this, please let me know if you need anything else from me to help facilitate the paper work. Have a great night,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVpVtFdz%2F%2BaSO4nqkjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVpVtFdz%2F%2BaSO4nqkjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. From: Sara Conde Sent: Tuesday, November 06, 2012 1:04 PM To: 'Fred Klapetzky' Subject: RE: Updated MBO Terms and Conditions with MD as the state of Law Hi Fred, Please find attached version of our MSA with governing law in MD. They should also sign and complete this statement of work <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVpVtFdz%2F%2BaSO4nqkjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> If you would like to introduce me to your contact via email that would be great. That way I can provide them with anything else they may need like W-9, certificate of insurace, etc. Thank you!Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVpVtFdz%2F%2BaSO4nqkjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVpVtFdz%2F%2BaSO4nqkjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVpVtFdz%2F%2BaSO4nqkjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: Fred Klapetzky [mailto:fklapetzky@gmail.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:fklapetzky@gmail.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVpVtFdz%2F%2BaSO4nqkjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>] Sent: Tuesday, November 06, 2012 11:24 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Updated MBO Terms and Conditions with MD as the state of Law Sara, if you already sent me this, I must have misplaced it. Could you please send me the terms and conditions with Maryland as the state of Law for the Johns Hopkins contract? I can modify the PDF, but it does not look neat when I do it. JHU survived the Sandy mess and is ready to get everything signed. Thanks, Fred Fred Klapetzky, Principal ConsultantA Going Concern Consulting Services872 Spring Valley DrOkawville, IL 62271 (618) 581-1047
